meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Carol Cling Tim Kozel John Lamb Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #721.

td.p: Carol Cling, a journalist from Las Vegas, Nevada
Tim Kozel, an attorney from Los Angeles, California
John Lamb, a savings and loan executive originally from New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,001)

tr.td: THE U.N.
THE BIG CATS
SOLITAIRE
INDIANA
FLYING ACES
"BAD"
